posts.text: 是个PHP的期末作业 登陆注册 学生教师端 增删查改 引入header和Footer12include('Menu/header.php');include('Menu/footer.php'); 注册登录系统数据库创建注册表1234567CREATE TABLE `register` ( `userId` int(20) NOT NULL AUTO_INCREMENT COMMENT '用户id', `userName` varchar(60) NOT NULL COMMENT '用户名', `passWord` varchar(60) NOT NULL COMMENT '用户密码', `passWordConfirm` varchar(60) NOT NULL COMMENT '确认密码', PRIMARY KEY (`userId`)) ENGINE=MyISAM AUTO_INCREMENT=5 DEFAULT CHARSET=utf8 数据库连接连接库1$con=new mysqli("localhost","root","","user","3306"); 测试连接123if($getCon->connect_error) { die("连接失败:".$getCon->connect_error);} 解决乱码1mysqli_query($getCon,"set names utf8"); 登录获取表单数据12$userName=$_POST['userName'];$passWord=$_POST['passWord']; 从数据库获取数据数据查询语句12$selData="select userName from $tableNam where userName='$userName' and passWord='$passWord';"; 判断账号密码12345678910111213$que=mysqli_query($getCon,$selData);$res=mysqli_fetch_row($que);if($res){ echo "<script> alert('$userName 登入成功'); self.location='../index.php'; </script>";}else{ echo "<script> alert('账号或密码错误,重新输入'); </script>"; } 注册获取表单数据123$userName=$_POST['userName'];$passWord=$_POST['passWord'];$passWordConfirm=$_POST['passWordConfirm']; 上传数据到数据库数据添加语句12$insertData="insert into register(userName,passWord,passWordConfirm) value('$userName','$passWord','$passWordConfirm');"; 判断用户名占用12345678$sel="select userName from $tableNam where userName = '$userName';";$que=mysqli_query($getCon,$sel);$pal=mysqli_fetch_row($que);if($pal){ echo "<script> alert('注册失败,用户$userName 已被占用'); </script>";} 执行上传数据库123456789if($getCon->query($insertData)){ echo "<script> alert('注册成功'); self.location='./login.php'; </script>";}else{ echo "<script>alert('注册失败')</script>";} 选课系统数据库导入数据库1source S:\Wamp\www\xk.sql 连接数据库1$con=new mysqli("localhost","root","","management","3306"); 测试连接123if($getCon->connect_error) { die("连接失败:".$getCon->connect_error);} 解决乱码1mysqli_query($getCon,"set names utf8"); 学生端课程预览学生信息学生选课所有课程输出123$selAllCou="SELECT CouName,Kind,Teacher,SchoolTime,CouNo FROM course; "; 查看已选课程12345$selCoued="SELECT c.CouName,c.Kind,c.Teacher,c.SchoolTime,c.CouNo FROM student s,course c,stucou sc WHERE s.StuNo=sc.StuNo AND c.CouNo=sc.CouNo AND s.StuNo='$StuNo' GROUP BY c.CouName; "; 查看未选课程12345$selCouNo="SELECT c.CouName,c.Kind,c.Teacher,c.SchoolTime,c.CouNo FROM student s,course c,stucou sc WHERE s.StuNo=sc.StuNo AND c.CouNo!=sc.CouNo AND s.StuNo='$StuNo' GROUP BY c.CouName; "; 执行12$resSelEd=mysqli_query($getCon,$selCoued);$resSelNo=mysqli_query($getCon,$selCouNo); 循环执行输出已选部分1234567891011while($row=mysqli_fetch_array($resSelEd)){ echo" <tr class=\"showCouCen\"> <td>{$row['CouName']}</td> <td>{$row['Kind']}</td> <td>{$row['Teacher']}</td> <td>{$row['SchoolTime']}</td> <td><input type='checkbox' value='{$row['CouNo']}' name='chebox[]' checked='checked' onclick='che(this)'></td> </tr> ";} 输出未选部分1234567891011while($row=mysqli_fetch_array($resSelNo)){ echo" <tr class=\"showCouCen\"> <td>{$row['CouName']}</td> <td>{$row['Kind']}</td> <td>{$row['Teacher']}</td> <td>{$row['SchoolTime']}</td> <td><input type='checkbox' value='{$row['CouNo']}' name='chebox[]' onclick='che(this)'></td> </tr> ";} 选课条件1234567891011echo "<script> var st=0,max=5 - $StuSum; function che(obj){ obj.checked?st++:st--; if(st>max){ obj.checked=false; alert('只能选五门'); st--; } }</script>"; 修改选课删除学生选课删除选课123$delCou="DELETE FROM stucou WHERE StuNo='$StuNo'; "; 执行1mysqli_query($getCon,$delCou); 更新选课获取已选课数1$sum=count($chebox); 更新数据库123456for($i=0;$i<$sum;$i+=1){ $ChoCou="INSERT INTO stucou(StuNo,CouNo,WillOrder,state) VALUE('$StuNo','$chebox[$i]',$i,'报名'); "; mysqli_query($getCon,$ChoCou);} 教师端浏览课程查询语句1$selCourse="select*from course"; 执行语句1$resSel=mysqli_query($getCon,$selCourse); 循环执行12345678910111213141516while($row=mysqli_fetch_array($resSel)){ echo" <tr class=\"showCouCen\"> <td>{$row['CouNo']}</td> <td>{$row['CouName']}</td> <td>{$row['Kind']}</td> <td>{$row['Credit']}</td> <td>{$row['Teacher']}</td> <td>{$row['DepartNo']}</td> <td>{$row['SchoolTime']}</td> <td>{$row['LimitNum']}</td> <td>{$row['WillNum']}</td> <td>{$row['ChooseNum']}</td> </tr> "; } 增加课程获取插入数据12345678910$CouNo=$_POST['CouNo'];$CouName==$_POST['CouName'];$Kind=$_POST['Kind'];$Credit=$_POST['Credit'];$Teacher=$_POST['Teacher'];$DepartNo=$_POST['DepartNo'];$SchoolTime=$_POST['SchoolTime'];$LimitNum=$_POST['LimitNum'];$WillNum=$_POST['WillNum'];$ChooseNum=$_POST['ChooseNum']; 插入语句12345$insCourse="insert into course(CouNo,CouName,Kind,Credit,Teacher,DepartNo,SchoolTime,LimitNum,WillNum,ChooseNum)value($CouNo,'$CouName','$Kind',$Credit,'$Teacher',$DepartNo,'$SchoolTime',$LimitNum,$WillNum,$ChooseNum)"; 执行语句12345678910111213141516if($getCon->query($insCourse)){ echo " <script> alert('插入成功'); self.location='../../teaCon/courseShow.php'; </script> ";}else{ echo " <script> alert('插入失败'); window.history.go(-1);//返回上一级 </script> ";} 修改课程条件查询1$selCourseWhe="select * from course where CouNo = $CouNo"; 获取数据12345678910$CouNo=$_POST['CouNo'];$CouName=$_POST['CouName'];$Kind=$_POST['Kind'];$Credit=$_POST['Credit'];$Teacher=$_POST['Teacher'];$DepartNo=$_POST['DepartNo'];$SchoolTime=$_POST['SchoolTime'];$LimitNum=$_POST['LimitNum'];$WillNum=$_POST['WillNum'];$ChooseNum=$_POST['ChooseNum']; 更新语句123456789101112$updCourse="UPDATE course SET CouNo=$CouNo, CouName='$CouName', Kind='$Kind', Credit=$Credit, Teacher='$Teacher', DepartNo=$DepartNo, SchoolTime='$SchoolTime', LimitNum=$LimitNum, WillNum=$WillNum, ChooseNum=$ChooseNumWHERE CouNo=$CouNo;"; 执行语句123456789101112if($getCon->query($updCourse)){ echo "<script> alert('修改成功'); self.location='../../teaCon/courseUpdata.php'; </script>";}else{ echo "<script> alert('修改失败'); window.history.go(-1); </script>"; } 删除课程删除语句1$delCourse="DELETE FROM course WHERE CouNo=$CouNo;"; 执行语句1234567891011if($getCon->query($delCourse)){ echo "<script> alert('删除成功'); self.location='../../teaCon/courseUpdata.php'; </script>"; } else{ echo "<script> alert('删除失败'); </script>"; } 搜索课程获取条件12$Condition=$_POST['Condition'];$Search=$_POST['Search']; 模糊搜索1$selCourse="select*from course where $Condition like '%$Search%'"; 执行语句1$resSel=mysqli_query($getCon,$selCourse); 遍历输出12345678910111213141516while($row=mysqli_fetch_array($resSel)){ echo" <tr class=\"showCouCen\"> <td>{$row['CouNo']}</td> <td>{$row['CouName']}</td> <td>{$row['Kind']}</td> <td>{$row['Credit']}</td> <td>{$row['Teacher']}</td> <td>{$row['DepartNo']}</td> <td>{$row['SchoolTime']}</td> <td>{$row['LimitNum']}</td> <td>{$row['WillNum']}</td> <td>{$row['ChooseNum']}</td> </tr> "; }

posts.title: Hexo使用与部署
posts.text: Hexo使用以及部署到仓库 HexoHexo安装 1npm install hexo-cli -g 创建Hexo所需文件 123hexo init myBlogcd myBlognpm install Hexo目录 12345678_config.yml-----网站的配置信息，可在此配置大部分的参数package.jsonscaffolds-------模版文件夹source----------资源文件夹，除 _posts 文件，其他以下划线_开头 的文件或者文件夹不会被编译打包到public文件夹 _drafts-----草稿文件 _posts------文章Markdowm文件 themes----------主题文件夹 Hexo常用命令 123npm install hexo -g------安装npm update hexo -g-------升级hexo init----------------初始化博客 12345hexo n 文章---------新建文章hexo g-------------生成hexo s-------------启动服务hexo d-------------部署hexo clean---------清理缓存 基于GitHub搭建创建仓库新建github用户名.github.io仓库 因为这里之前我已经创建了所以报错 配置SSH Key要使用 git 工具要先配置SSH key，为部署本地博客到 Github 做准备。 打开命令行输入 cd ~/.ssh如果没报错或者提示什么的说明就是以前生成过的，直接使用 cat ~/.ssh/id_rsa.pub 命令就可以查看本机上的 SSH key 。 如果之前没创建，则全局配置本地用户 12git config --global user.name "用户名"git config --global user.email "邮箱地址" 生成SSH Key 1ssh-keygen -t rsa -C '邮箱地址' 获取SSH Key 1~/.ssh/id_rsa.pub 验证是否设置成功 1ssh -T git@github.com 打开GitHub设置添加刚生成的SSH Key 填入刚查到的SSH Key 部署到Github修改配置文件 修改根目录下**-config.yml**文件 给hexo d命令做部署位置的配置，让hexo知道部署在GitHub仓库 安装部署插件hexo-deployer-git 1npm install hexo-deployer-git --save 执行命令部署上传 1hexo g -d 图床
